item.title: Delivery
item.dc:creator: admin_apr
item.content:encoded:
Write a comment
  • All orders shipped with UPS Express.
  • Always free shipping for orders over US $250.
  • All orders are shipped with a UPS tracking number.
Returns
  • Items returned within 14 days of their original shipment date in same as new condition will be eligible for a full refund or store credit.
  • Refunds will be charged back to the original form of payment used for purchase.
  • Customer is responsible for shipping charges when making returns and shipping/handling fees of original purchase is non-refundable.
  • All sale items are final purchases.

It's not an idea or a product, but people.

Martin Nguyen

Digital Strategy

We translate research insights into communication tasks, then build digital strategy to obtain specific objectives.

Social Marketing

We align social media with your marketing plan, obtain business objective through empowering consumer strategically.

PPC Management

We select PPC channels through backtrack data knowledge, integrate it with daily optimization.

Interactive platform

Customer experience is all we focus in building platforms

Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin_apr
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Our website address is: http://hn.arrowpress.net/arrowit-sample.

What personal data we collect and why we collect it

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Contact forms

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics

Who we share your data with

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Your contact information

Additional information

How we protect your data

What data breach procedures we have in place

What third parties we receive data from

What automated decision making and/or profiling we do with user data

Industry regulatory disclosure requirements

item.content:encoded:
Worldâ€™s Biggest Inhouse SEO Team

We are a team of 200+SEO, 50+ Social Media, 40+ Web Designers, 35+ PPC, 90+ Content writers, 30+ Branding Experts ready to serve your business

Advanced SEO Company, Creating Custom SEO Services

Find Out More User Friendly like your Visitors Want. We optimize like Google Wants. Generate ROI as you Want.

Worldâ€™s Biggest Inhouse SEO Team

We are a team of 200+SEO, 50+ Social Media, 40+ Web Designers, 35+ PPC, 90+ Content writers, 30+ Branding Experts ready to serve your business

request an SEO Audit







A New Age SEO Strategy For Your Business

Arrowseo is a results-driven SEO Company in India that offers solutions to generate qualified sales, leads with guaranteed brand building. Our strength lies in consultation, diagnosis, and guiding our clients with the digital marketing trends and practices. We sell solutions to help you increase sales through digital methodologies.

Our Solutions Pricing

How We Work

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et.

How We Work

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et.

Analysis

We begin with in-depth analysis of your website to collect data and analytics of your business.

Diagnosis

After the analysis, we proceed by developing a suitable roadmap based on the challenges and needs of your business.

Implementation

At last. our professionals take charge of their individual and collective responsibilities to bring the plan into action.

Our Strength

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting

Ranking

As the top SEO Company, we ensure your business gets the utmost recognition in each and every nook of the world. With regular shout-outs, and promotional techniques we create strong brand awareness for you in the global market.

Traffic

A website without enough visitors is like a barren land. Simply unproductive! At Arrowseo, we ensure our clients get the right visitors on their websites with our sharp vision, right SEO and link building. At the end, itâ€™s the peopleâ€™s interest that makes sense for every business.

Leads

Getting traffic is something, but generating lead is actually the foundation for every business success. We are being referred to as the Best SEO Company In India by our happy clients. And why not? We have been persistent in getting them high quality leads through our SEO strategies

Ranking

As the top SEO Company, we ensure your business gets the utmost recognition in each and every nook of the world. With regular shout-outs, and promotional techniques we create strong brand awareness for you in the global market.

What Customers Say About Us

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the indus- try's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s.

Jenny AdamsDesigner“ArrowSeo consistently delivers excellent results. We enjoy working with them and have seen a strong return for our investment”John DeoCEO & founder“Arrowseo has become a strategic partner not only regarding web based marketing but as a contributor to our comprehensive marketing program.”John DeoCEO & founder“Arrowseo has increased our traffic, keywords, and conversion. Weâ€™ve enjoyed working with them and consider them a strategic business partner.”John DeoCEO & founder“ArrowSeo consistently delivers excellent results. We enjoy working with them and have seen a strong return for our investment”

Want To Rank #1 On Google?

Say Hello!

Why Arrowseo Is The Best SEO Agency?

The unique approach at Arrowseo that uses data, and only data, makes it stand ahead of the rest of the SEO industry. We donâ€™t talk smoke and mirrors here; our strategies are leads and sales driven!

Real Time Data

We strongly follow Google Analytics to collect real data about your business. All our SEO campaigns begin from scratch by strictly analyzing your past and present business data analytics to assure our flow in the right direction.

Google AdWords Certified Company

You're in safe hands with Arrowseo! We are an AdWords qualified company. We have professional accreditation and Google recognizes us as an expert in online advertising.

True in-house SEO talent from the Top 3%

Arrowseo has over 200+ true in-house SEO brilliant professionals from the top 3% of Digital Marketing talent, which is selected after a 7-round screening process.

Guaranteed Page #1 Ranking

That's where your brand deserves to be! We offer guaranteed ranking with white hat SEO solutions (written guarantee agreement) in an agreed timeframe as per the website and keyword analysis.

14570+ Recommendations & Testimonials under Our Belt

Arrowseo has 14500+ positive client recommendations and feedbacks on various platforms like Upwork, PPH, TOPSEOs.com, Clutch.co, GoodFirms.co, FindBestSEO.com just to name a few.

Daily/Weekly Reporting

We focus on delivering detailed reporting and tracking of your daily and weekly traffic reports. You can witness your business growing with us.

Assured Leads & Provable ROI

With us, you no more need to worry if SEO is generating you a net-positive return. Traffic and lead generation are our foremost focus which will eventually turn your finances upsurge.

Complete Transparency

The duplicity in the SEO industry is well-known. But we don't care! Arrowseo offers a revolutionary level of visibility into our campaigns from start till end. So, you can trust us to get the job done with complete loyalty.

24/7 Service and Support

At Arrowseo, our client relationships do not start at 9 am and end at 6 am. The relationships stay and we strive to deliver real-time support and the quality services that our clients deserve.

item.title: About us
item.dc:creator: admin_apr
item.content:encoded:
Our vision and mission

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Quis ipsum suspendisse ultrices gravida.
  • Maecenas tincidunt
  • Bring the Arrowtech to a new height and farther distance
  • Make Arrowtech grow equally to world-class software development corporations globally.

Our philosophy and motto

  • Which factor constitutes internal power of a company? We believe it is solidarity. And at Arrowtech, we build the atmosphere of a cozy and connected FAMILY for all the members so they can call it their second HOME. Working under one roof of the family, we develop the interaction, mutual support between the individuals and nurture their respect and pride for the company.
  • Which determines the success of an outsourcing company? Definitely it is the relationship with your customer. Therefore, we always pay our utmost attention to build the friendly and borderless relationship with our customers so they will become our best partner and friend finally.
0+Years in outsourcing00Offices0+Staffs Member0+Staffs Member

Customers say about us?

CEO & Founder“Don't stop. Keep a continuously burning desire and attempt to achieve huge targets”CEO “Don't stop. Keep a continuously burning desire and attempt to achieve huge targets” Founder“Don't stop. Keep a continuously burning desire and attempt to achieve huge targets”

item.title: Our Process
item.dc:creator: admin_apr
item.content:encoded:
• Analysis

    Once a customer starts discussing his requirements, the team gets into it, towards the preliminary requirement analysis... 01

  • Specification building

    Preliminary specifications are drawn up by covering up each and every element of the requirement, eg. layout, site structure and... 02

  • Graphics design

    After building the specification, work on the web site is scheduled upon receipt of the signed proposal, a deposit, and any written content... 03

  • Coding

    It is time that programmers turning the design into a more vividly functional website. While the mocks are being designed, the programmers must recommend his technical knowledge to the designers so as to enhance the flexibility of the site and avoid further malfunctioned elements. The site will be sent to our clients in specified phases for preview and comments if any. The end-user documentation can also , which can be used by a i am writing to make this longer please don't mind, technical writes helps and manuals later. 04

  • Testing

    Unlike software, web based applications need intensive testing, applications'll always function as a multi-user system with bandwidth... 05

  • Maintenance

    Further updates and their corresponding quotes will be discussed and processed upon agreement after the site has been... 06

Digital A creative digital agency The true meaning of creativity is people oriented approach Digital A creative digital agency The true meaning of creativity is people oriented approach Digital A creative digital agency The true meaning of creativity is people oriented approach Start

0

"There is no better tool that could immensely expand your brand like people - The original marketing tool. Thus, the best way to enhance your brand is make it steps into people's heart."

It's not an idea or a product, but people.

Martin Nguyen

Digital Strategy

We translate research insights into communication tasks, then build digital strategy to obtain specific objectives.

Social Marketing

We align social media with your marketing plan, obtain business objective through empowering consumer strategically.

PPC Management

We select PPC channels through backtrack data knowledge, integrate it with daily optimization.

Interactive platform

Customer experience is all we focus in building platforms

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin_apr
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Home Webmaster
item.dc:creator: admin_apr
item.content:encoded:
Seasoned Experts to Build, Fix and Nurture Websites Modern solutions by experienced webmasters who know how to do it right. We can start from scratch, provide ad hoc maintenance or be the 24/7 guardian angels of any website. Choose a plan or talk to us for a flexible monthly pricing. Free Quote Check Out Plans

Get connected with world-class skills in just 3 quick steps

1. Contact us to get a free quote and consultation

2. Project gets paired with the right webmaster

3. We take care of everything

Featured Services

Webmaster Company's services are dedicated for websitesâ€™ maximum up-time, compliant and security. We use the latest technologies and innovative infrastructures to provide consistent, reliable services.

Ad-hoc Maintenance

Regular backup, update and reporting. Innovative cloud and physical infrastructures. Lightning-fast servers. 99.9% uptime.

Website Development

Build-for-you high-performing websites. We can start from scratch or help with existing web development work.

Website Management

Cost-effective and quality-focused web management services for websites of all types. Expert webmasters. 24/7 services.

Website Management

Cost-effective and quality-focused web management services for websites of all types. Expert webmasters. 24/7 services.

Virus Removal

We recover websites, fix them and work to ensure security. Analysis and reports included. Free quote and consultation.

Virus Removal

We recover websites, fix them and work to ensure security. Analysis and reports included. Free quote and consultation.

Server Support

99.9% uptime. Fast-loading websites. Innovative infrastructures. Compliant facilities. 24/7 expert tech support

SEO

Proven-effective SEO techniques. Individualized solutions. Search engine compliant strategies. Targeted results

Webmaster company

Seasoned experts. Cost-effective web solutions. Innovative cloud and physical infrastructures. 24/7 expert technical support. Youâ€™re in good company.

Get Started Now

item.title: Home IoT
item.dc:creator: admin_apr
item.content:encoded:
• Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Linkedin

DEAKO SMART Lighting

About Us

Lampo always strives to
realize our ideas

We are an award winning design agency that implement and manufactures our own ideas focusing on product design and UX/UI. We cover everything from software and hardware development to production and marketing to create a unique and innovative user experience.

New Product

Smartrope rookie

Smartrope rookie is lighter, easier, and more fun. And supports cardio workout.
  • Freely adjustable rope length : It can be used for both children and adults.
  • Store 1000 sets of data in memory, exercise like normal jump rope and analyze exercise data.
  • Ultra-low power design allows very long use with coin-cell battery.
Buy Now More info

LED-embedded

Smartrope

Smart Rope is an LED-embedded jump rope that displays your
fitness workout data in mid-air, as you work out.

  • 23 LEDs: High quality, bright LEDs display your fitness data clearly, even in bright rooms.
  • Four Characters: Smart Rope displays your workout jump count up to four digits.
  • Smart Gym: Sync to the free Smart Gym mobile app to track jump count, calories burned, work out times, and interval training.
Buy Now More info

Pure

Smart Rope PURE

Smart Rope PURE is a faster, stronger, and smarter connected cardio workout experience.

  • Adjustable: PURE features an adjustable jump rope length.
  • One-time sync: Smart Rope stores up to 100 sets of fitness workout data and syncs to Smart Gym.
  • No LEDs but longer battery life: 2 hours of charge and 45 hours of jump rope use.
Buy Now More info Jenny Adams“This wearable technology is something you can physically use to improve your fitness.. Take your jump rope workout to a whole new level” Jenny Adams“Smart Rope delivered.. the mid-air display felt like magic.. it actually helped me stay focused.. you can't cheat either” Jenny Adams“Great work, very helpful and patient. Happy to make changes and updates to help achieve required outcome. Would recommend” Jenny Adams“It works well.. In fact, you can easily zone out watching the count.. Makes it easy to set goals”

Smart Rope Design Awards

Design award 2016

Good Design award 2016

Reddot Design award

Follow us on Instagram

Subscribe to us

item.title: Lampo Page
item.dc:creator: admin_apr
item.content:encoded:
THE EVOLUTION OF A CLASSIC Smart Rope is an LED-embedded jump rope that displays your fitness data in mid-air, as you work out. Watch The Video LAMPO

PRODUCT FEATURES

Beautiful

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

Smart

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

Simple

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

Flexible

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

What can Lampo smart rope do for you?

Stores up to 100 sets of fitness

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard.

Sync, connect to smart gym

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard.

Exercise data analysis

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard.

Adjust the exercise accordingly

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard.

Jenny Adams“â€œEmbedded LED Smart Rope - A great product. I used it and felt really satisfied. It set me up for an exercise that fits my energy. Thanks for letting me meet it.â€”Jenny Adams“â€œEmbedded LED Smart Rope - A great product. I used it and felt really satisfied. It set me up for an exercise that fits my energy. Thanks for letting me meet it.â€”Jenny Adams“â€œEmbedded LED Smart Rope - A great product. I used it and felt really satisfied. It set me up for an exercise that fits my energy. Thanks for letting me meet it.â€” LED EmbeddedFour Characters“SmartRope displays your workout jump count up to four digits. With future software updates, SmartRope will display calories burned, interval training data, and other symbols and icons to register double unders and other relevant fitness workout information. ”LED Embedded23 LEDs“High quality, bright LEDs display your fitness data clearly, even in bright rooms.”LED EmbeddedPersistence of Vision“Much like film or animated movies, the LEDS fire at different times as the SmartRope rotates around you, creating the appearance of a single display floating in mid-air during your workout.” Sophisticated DesignComfortable 45 Degree Angle“The innovative 45 degree angel allows the jump rope handles to be held naturally, at the ideal path for the rope to travel. This new design also allows for the handles to be evenly weighted for maximum control of the LED workout display.”Sophisticated Design2x2 Smooth Ball Bearings“Two sets of ball bearings in each handle result in a silky smooth jump rope motion. Even with all the tech housed in SmartRope, the rope is driven with ease. ”Sophisticated Design360 Degree Tracking“SmartRopeâ€™s proprietary sensors detect full 360 degree revolutions of the rope and track them as complete jumps. This allows for a level of accuracy in your exercise data that canâ€™t be achieved by the simple gyroscopes or accelerometers found in most fitness wearables. ”

Colors and Finishes

The simple yet striking design of Smart Rope is available in 4 colors, to complement your fitness training apparel and personality. Express yourself in Chrome, Gold, Black, or Red.

Give Smart Rope an extra splash of color and protect it from wear and tear with the silicon Soft Grips, available in Orange, Blue, Green, Pink, and Neutral.

SPECIFICATIONS

Size: W30 X H150 X D30 (mm)

Color: Chrome / Gold / Black

Rope Length: XS: 228cm (137 - 147cm tall), S: 243cm (152 - 163cm tall), M: 258cm (165 - 175cm tall), L: 274cm (178 - 188cm tall)

Weight (without packaging): XS: 294g, S: 301g, M: 308g, L: 314g, XL : 317g

Connectivity Bluetooth: 4.0 LE,

LED: 23 X 5600K color temperature LED

Battery: Full charge in 2 hours, 36 hours of use,

USER GUIDE

  • 01 Smart Gym Setup
  • 02 Pairing Smart Rope
  • 03 Start Workout
  • 04 Additional Features

Subscribe to us

item.title: The era of 6-second advertising has arrived
item.dc:creator: admin_apr
item.content:encoded:
Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.
